name: GetArtifactFromUncShare
description: Gets the contents of a remote TFS server build's drop location
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: tfsUri
inputs.label: TFS Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URI of the TFS server  e.g. http://myserver:8080/tfs/defaultcollection

inputs.name: teamproject
inputs.label: Team Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the source team project

inputs.name: defname
inputs.label: Build definition name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the build definition.

inputs.name: artifactname
inputs.label: Artifact name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the build artifact.

inputs.name: buildnumber
inputs.label: Specific build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of the build to download (if blank latest complete build used)

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: User name to access remote server (if blank default creds. used)

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to access remote server (if blank default creds. used)

inputs.name: localdir
inputs.label: Local Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root directory to store the artifact in, defaults to $(SYSTEM.ARTIFACTSDIRECTORY)
